```{r 040201setup, include=FALSE}
## 040201 ->- Poisson random variable X ~ Pois(lambda), find P(X = k).
```


```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(MASS)

signifDig = 4

sol=1
while((sol<0.00001)|(sol>0.9999)){
  n <- sample(5:8, 1)
  lambda <- sample(3:7,1)
  k <- sample(2:4,1)
  sol = signif(dpois(k, lambda), digits=signifDig)
}


## QUESTION/ANSWER GENERATION

(sol = signif(sol, signifDig))

```


```{r eval=(language == "en"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
question=paste0("$X$ is a Poisson random variable of type $X\\sim\\operatorname{Pois}(\\lambda = ", lambda, ")$. Find the probability $$P( X = ", k,").$$ Use  ", signifDig, " significant digits in your answer.")
  
answer=paste0("The answer is ", sol)

```
